cluster.name: Pressure Measurement
cluster.description: This cluster provides an interface to pressure measurement functionality, including configuration and provision of notifications of pressure measurements.

history.description: New data model format and notation

attributes.name: MeasuredValue
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL represent the pressure in kPa as follows: MeasuredValue = 10 x Pressure [kPa]. The null value indicates that the value is not available.

attributes.name: MinMeasuredValue
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the minimum value of MeasuredValue that can be measured. The null value indicates that the value is not available.

attributes.name: MaxMeasuredValue
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the maximum value of MeasuredValue that can be measured. The null value indicates that the value is not available.

attributes.name: ScaledValue
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL represent the pressure in Pascals as follows: ScaledValue = 10^Scale x Pressure [Pa]. The null value indicates that the value is not available.

attributes.name: MinScaledValue
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the minimum value of ScaledValue that can be measured. The null value indicates that the value is not available.

attributes.name: MaxScaledValue
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the maximum value of ScaledValue that can be measured. The null value indicates that the value is not available.

attributes.name: ScaledTolerance
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the magnitude of the possible error that is associated with ScaledValue. The true value is located in the range (ScaledValue â€“ ScaledTolerance) to (ScaledValue + ScaledTolerance).

attributes.name: Scale
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the base 10 exponent used to obtain ScaledValue (see ScaledValue).
